info: Rating, 5 stars,  · February 2024,  · Stayed about a week
rating_comment: Nice room with good location, house owner is really helpful. I am from china, and I will choose here next time I come.

info: Rating, 4 stars,  · July 2023,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment:
It was a good place stay for while. Services was good.
Overall our stay was peaceful.
Very convenient location with a beautiful Ramna park close by for recreation and physical activity. Good caffè and restaurant with 10 minutes walk. Available transport.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · July 2022,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: Excellent location. Secured place . The place was clean enough and it was spacious as per description. The host was very communicative and well behaved . Peaceful place to stay.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · June 2022,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment:
Tamzid is a nice person, very helpful !
The appartement is perfectly located in Dhaka, you can easily reach old Dhaka or Gulshan. In the middle of Dhaka.
I stayed one month, could sleep with fresh air (a lot of windows) despite the summer. Private bathroom. Shops just in the next buildings, so you can live easily without time management stress.
Park 10min walking away, peaceful and safe area because schools sector.
